review: I expected to have access to more than what this gave me. It would appear to have limited use for our family. The price was not unreasonable
author: starfish

review: Amazing little gizmo!  Turned my not-so-smart TV into something i can get WIFI streaming on!  Fabulous piece of technology!
author: B. Anderson

review: so far so good very easy to set up love it
author: Amazon Customer

review: Worked great for my daughters bedroom!
author: Joy

review: The fire stick is fantastic ! So easy to set up and use!
author: Charlene Kagel

review: This is amazing. Not sure why I waited so long to buy it. Must get if you have Amazon Prime.
author: John Spadora

review: Works fine with Netflix and Amazon Prime but won't "Cast" from computer to TV like Chromecast. At least I've not been able to get to do so. I bought another Chromecast to replace my Fire Stick.
author: jim riley
